Farmers all over the world know the   _   of the seasons. They know that there is a season to plant and a season to   _   ; everything must be done in its own time.     _     the rain pours down, stopping all   _  activities, farmers lift their    _   to the heavens and smile. The rains in the month of April    give rise to   the beautiful flowers in the month of May.
But this ancient truth tells us   more than   that-it is an   _   message of hope to all who experience tragedy in life. A broken relationship with one can     open up   the door to a new friendship with another. A    _   job here can provide the opportunity for a better job there. A   _   dream can become the foundation of a wonderful future.    _   this:   Darkness may last for a night, but it will never overcome
